Module fastwritinggame
Package com.fastwriting.model

Class WordGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.fastwriting.model.WordGenerator
public class WordGenerator extends Object
Generates random words and phrases for the Fast Writing game. Provides different difficulty levels with increasingly complex content.
Since:
2024
Version:
2.0
Author:
[Your Name]

  • Method Details

    • getRandomWord

      public String getRandomWord(int level)
      Returns a random word or phrase based on the current game level. Difficulty increases progressively as levels advance.
      Parameters:
      level - the current game level
      Returns:
      a random word or phrase appropriate for the level

      Returns:
